mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (m_id, m_name, m_mail, m_pwd, m_celphone, m_birth) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_mail}, #{m_pwd}, #{m_celphone}, #{m_birth});
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET m_name=#{m_name}, m_mail=#{m_name}, m_pwd=#{m_pwd}, m_celphone=#{m_celphone}, m_birth=#{m_birth} WHERE m_num=#{m_num};
mapper.select: select * from member group by m_num
